models.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:camunda="http://camunda.org/schema/1.0/bpmn" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:modeler="http://camunda.org/schema/modeler/1.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" exporter="Camunda Modeler" exporterVersion="5.6.0" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" id="Definitions_0nqekc2" modeler:executionPlatform="Camunda Platform" modeler:executionPlatformVersion="7.18.0" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
    
  <bpmn:process id="TwitterQAProcess" isClosed="false" isExecutable="true" name="Twitter QA Process" processType="None">
        
    <bpmn:startEvent camunda:formKey="embedded:app:forms/start.html" id="StartEvent_1" isInterrupting="true" name="Tweet written" parallelMultiple="false">
            
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_0h3hhfu</bpmn:outgoing>
          
    </bpmn:startEvent>
        
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_0h3hhfu" sourceRef="StartEvent_1" targetRef="review-tweet"/>
        
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway gatewayDirection="Unspecified" id="Gateway_19xkace" name="Tweet Approved ?">
            
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_1jdqp3w</bpmn:incoming>
            
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_01rf1je</bpmn:outgoing>
            
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_1at0r7x</bpmn:outgoing>
          
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
        
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_1jdqp3w" sourceRef="review-tweet" targetRef="Gateway_19xkace"/>
        
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_01rf1je" name="Yes" sourceRef="Gateway_19xkace" targetRef="publish-tweet">
            
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">#{approved == true}</bpmn:conditionExpression>
          
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
        
    <bpmn:endEvent id="tweet-published" name="Tweet published">
            
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_1xodnib</bpmn:incoming>
          
    </bpmn:endEvent>
        
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_1xodnib" sourceRef="publish-tweet" targetRef="tweet-published"/>
        
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_1at0r7x" name="No" sourceRef="Gateway_19xkace" targetRef="notify-employee">
            
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">#{approved == false}</bpmn:conditionExpression>
          
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
        
    <bpmn:endEvent id="tweet-rejected" name="Tweet Rejected">
            
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_0o6ta6d</bpmn:incoming>
          
    </bpmn:endEvent>
        
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_0o6ta6d" sourceRef="notify-employee" targetRef="tweet-rejected"/>
        
    <bpmn:serviceTask camunda:asyncBefore="true" camunda:class="com.camunda.training.delegate.CreateTweetDelegate" completionQuantity="1" id="publish-tweet" implementation="##WebService" isForCompensation="false" name="Publish Tweet" startQuantity="1">
            
      <bpmn:extensionElements>
                
        <camunda:failedJobRetryTimeCycle>R4/PT5M</camunda:failedJobRetryTimeCycle>
              
      </bpmn:extensionElements>
            
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_01rf1je</bpmn:incoming>
            
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_084klu0</bpmn:incoming>
            
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_1xodnib</bpmn:outgoing>
          
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
        
    <bpmn:serviceTask camunda:topic="notification" camunda:type="external" completionQuantity="1" id="notify-employee" implementation="##WebService" isForCompensation="false" name="Notify user of rejection" startQuantity="1">
            
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_1at0r7x</bpmn:incoming>
            
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_0o6ta6d</bpmn:outgoing>
          
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
        
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_084klu0" sourceRef="Event_0wrn597" targetRef="publish-tweet"/>
        
    <bpmn:startEvent id="Event_0wrn597" isInterrupting="true" name="Tweet submitted by superuser" parallelMultiple="false">
            
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_084klu0</bpmn:outgoing>
            
      <bpmn:messageEventDefinition id="MessageEventDefinition_0caqh24" messageRef="Message_2q0aqvl"/>
          
    </bpmn:startEvent>
        
    <bpmn:businessRuleTask camunda:decisionRef="tweetApproval" camunda:mapDecisionResult="singleEntry" camunda:resultVariable="approved" completionQuantity="1" id="review-tweet" implementation="##unspecified" isForCompensation="false" name="Review Tweet" startQuantity="1">
            
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_0h3hhfu</bpmn:incoming>
            
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_1jdqp3w</bpmn:outgoing>
          
    </bpmn:businessRuleTask>
      
  </bpmn:process>
    
  <bpmn:message id="Message_2q0aqvl" name="superuserTweet"/>
    
  <bpmn:message id="Message_2o3nc2a" name="tweetWithdrawn"/>
    
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_1">
        
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane bpmnElement="TwitterQAProcess" id="BPMNPlane_1">
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="StartEvent_1" id="_BPMNShape_StartEvent_2">
                
        <dc:Bounds height="36" width="36" x="152" y="212"/>
                
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
                    
          <dc:Bounds height="14" width="64" x="138" y="255"/>
                  
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="Gateway_19xkace" id="Gateway_19xkace_di" isMarkerVisible="true">
                
        <dc:Bounds height="50" width="50" x="425" y="205"/>
                
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
                    
          <dc:Bounds height="14" width="88" x="485" y="223"/>
                  
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="tweet-published" id="Event_0igb0wc_di">
                
        <dc:Bounds height="36" width="36" x="692" y="82"/>
                
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
                    
          <dc:Bounds height="14" width="79" x="671" y="125"/>
                  
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="tweet-rejected" id="Event_0e34swc_di">
                
        <dc:Bounds height="36" width="36" x="692" y="292"/>
                
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
                    
          <dc:Bounds height="14" width="75" x="673" y="335"/>
                  
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="notify-employee" id="Activity_01gy6or_di">
                
        <dc:Bounds height="80" width="100" x="530" y="270"/>
                
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel/>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="review-tweet" id="Activity_0bo1abh_di">
                
        <dc:Bounds height="80" width="100" x="270" y="190"/>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="publish-tweet" id="Activity_0yct40i_di">
                
        <dc:Bounds height="80" width="100" x="540" y="60"/>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="Event_0wrn597" id="Event_04dixsu_di">
                
        <dc:Bounds height="36" width="36" x="152" y="72"/>
                
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
                    
          <dc:Bounds height="27" width="80" x="130" y="115"/>
                  
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="Flow_0h3hhfu" id="Flow_0h3hhfu_di">
                
        <di:waypoint x="188" y="230"/>
                
        <di:waypoint x="270" y="230"/>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="Flow_1jdqp3w" id="Flow_1jdqp3w_di">
                
        <di:waypoint x="370" y="230"/>
                
        <di:waypoint x="425" y="230"/>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="Flow_01rf1je" id="Flow_01rf1je_di">
                
        <di:waypoint x="450" y="205"/>
                
        <di:waypoint x="450" y="120"/>
                
        <di:waypoint x="540" y="120"/>
                
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
                    
          <dc:Bounds height="14" width="18" x="511" y="110"/>
                  
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="Flow_1xodnib" id="Flow_1xodnib_di">
                
        <di:waypoint x="640" y="100"/>
                
        <di:waypoint x="692" y="100"/>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="Flow_1at0r7x" id="Flow_1at0r7x_di">
                
        <di:waypoint x="450" y="255"/>
                
        <di:waypoint x="450" y="310"/>
                
        <di:waypoint x="530" y="310"/>
                
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
                    
          <dc:Bounds height="14" width="15" x="458" y="278"/>
                  
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="Flow_0o6ta6d" id="Flow_0o6ta6d_di">
                
        <di:waypoint x="630" y="310"/>
                
        <di:waypoint x="692" y="310"/>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
            
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="Flow_084klu0" id="Flow_084klu0_di">
                
        <di:waypoint x="188" y="90"/>
                
        <di:waypoint x="540" y="90"/>
              
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
          
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
      
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
  
</bpmn:definitions>
